detail_desc: Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.

prod_name: Luke low price s/l pj SB
detail_desc: Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt top with a print motif and shorts with an elasticated waist.
Short cold shoulder dress in cotton poplin with an elasticated flounce at the top, opening and button at the back of the neck and gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in slightly stretchy denim with a zip fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Fully-fashioned trainers with rubber details, elasticated lacing and loops front and back. Mesh insoles and rubber soles.

Long satin dress with a V-neck at the front, concealed zip at the back and short, flounced sleeves. Seam with pleats at the waist and a wrapover skirt with high slits in the sides. Double-layered bodice and an unlined skirt.
Poncho in a soft, fine knit with a diagonal neckline that creates a light draping effect over one shoulder. Length front and back approx. 95 cm.
Straight-cut top in linen jersey with a V-neck and short sleeves.
Top in soft organic cotton jersey with short butterfly sleeves.

Sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with an integral sports bra. Vest top with deep armholes and an opening at the back. Sports bra with a double layer of fabric at the front, a racer back and an elasticated hem.
Jumper in soft, rib-knit chenille with long, wide raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Trousers in an airy viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Set with a cap and sun hat in cotton. Cap in jersey with an embroidered motif on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back. Sun hat in patterned twill. Lined.
Poncho in a soft knit with a hole for the head.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with a smocked seam at the waist and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Lined hood, kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

V-neck jumpsuit in a patterned weave with notch lapels, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Seam at the waist with a tab and button at the sides, 3/4-length sleeves with a short slit at the cuffs, and straight, ankle-length legs.
Metal hair clips with a padded appliqué.
Gently tailored shirt in a stretch cotton blend with a turn-down collar, V-neck, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Puffer gilet in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and detachable, lined hood. Zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets and smocking at the sides. Lined.
Headband in a soft knit with a wrapover front.
Fitted top in soft jersey with flounced cap sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit.
Shorts in cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fly with a button, fake front pockets and a fake back pocket.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a lace yoke and gently rounded hem.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front (normal sequins in size 2-3Y). Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Top in slub pima cotton jersey with dropped shoulders and short, tiered sleeves.
Off-the-shoulder, knee-length dress in viscose jersey with a smocked bodice and short, smocked sleeves with overlocked edges. Overlocked top edge, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt.
Puff pants in a cotton weave with elastication and a frill trim at the waist and elasticated hems.
Fisherman's hat in cotton twill with an embroidered motif. Width of brim 7 cm.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes and designs with one twisted pair. Diameter from 1.5 cm to 2.2 cm.
Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Fine-knit shaftless socks with a silicone trim around the heel to hold them in place.
Short T-shirt in cotton jersey with a motif on the front and an elasticated hem.
Short-sleeved top in soft, printed jersey with a round neck and flared, asymmetric hem. The top is made from recycled polyester.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with side pockets and tapered legs with foldover ribbing at the hems. Wide ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a round neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.
Elasticated scrunchie in woven fabric with long ties.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in an airy weave. High waist with covered elastication. Lined.

Short skirt in a textured weave with a slight sheen. Regular waist with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at the back. Second layer of fabric on the top with gathered seams at the sides and back to create a draped effect. Lined.

Playsuit in a patterned weave with a V-neck, wrapover front with a concealed press-stud at the top and 3/4-length, cuffed sleeves. Elasticated seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist, side pockets and short legs. Partly lined.
Fitted top in ribbed jersey with a stand-up collar and short sleeves.

Calf-length dress in airy tulle with visible vertical seams. Straight cut at the top with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck, and a flared, voluminous skirt. Sewn-in inner dress with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a V-neck, a visible seam front and back, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. The jumper is made partly from recycled polyester.
V-neck body in velour with narrow, double shoulder straps that cross at the back and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide, drawstring waistband and cuffed hems.
Cropped top in jersey crêpe with a V-neck, opening with ties at the back and long trumpet sleeves.
Short skirt in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist and pleated tiers. Lined.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.

Studio Collection. A pair of large, tear-shaped clip earrings in gold-coloured metal covered in glass rhinestones. Length approx. 7 cm. Width approx. 4.5 cm. Studio Collection AW20 is a tribute to the rebellious, fearless individual who dares to break the mould – an individual who plays between the extremes and finds their style amongst the androgynous, eclectic and creative.
Padded sleep bag in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and zip at one side. Jersey lining. The sleep bag is designed for indoor use only.
Trousers in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey with wide foldover ribbing at the waist.
LOVE STORIES x H&M. Wash bag in a patterned weave with embroidered text, a zip at the top and wrist strap at one side. Lined. Size 20x27 cm.
Ankle-length trousers in imitation leather with a high waist, zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening, front pockets and wide, tapered legs.
Scarf in patterned satin. Size 90x90 cm.
Sleeveless, cropped, rib-knit top. Narrow cut at the top with short shoulder straps.
Shorts in organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and draping at the front.
Lightly padded, glittery bat wings for a dog. Satin-covered elastic strap to go around the front legs.
Hair elastics without metal clips.
Relaxed-fit blouse in a crêpe weave with a collar, partially concealed buttons down the front, short dolman sleeves and a yoke with a pleat at the back.
Brazilian briefs in jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Lace Brazilian briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.

Short, A-line dress in a crêpe weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems, and gathered seams at the waist and hem creating tiers for added width. Sleeveless jersey underdress.
Dress in a patterned viscose weave with a stand-up collar and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and frills down the front and at the waist. Unlined.
Long, straight-cut coat in woven fabric with notch lapels, a detachable tie belt at the waist, pockets in the side seams and high slits in the sides. No buttons. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in a soft viscose weave with a small frilled collar and V-neck opening at the front with narrow ties at the top. Seam with narrow, concealed elastication under the bust and long sleeves with frill-trimmed smocking at the cuffs. Unlined.

V-neck bra top in microfibre with a lined front, wide shoulder straps and padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Folded, glued edges at the top for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin and minimal visibility under clothes. No fasteners.
Scarf in woven fabric with fringes along the short sides. Size 100x200 cm.
Cardigan knitted in a soft mohair blend with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves, front pockets and no buttons.
Large sunglasses with plastic and metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Scarf in woven fabric with fringes on the short sides.
Short shorts in airy, patterned chiffon with an elasticated waist and frilled hems. Lined.
Wide, 5-pocket jeans in washed cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and wide, straight legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Chinos in slightly stretchy cotton twill with a regular waist and zip fly. Side pockets, flap back pockets with a button, and gently tapered legs.
Slightly longer, straight-cut, single-breasted jacket in soft velvet with notch lapels. One shiny metal button at the front and flap welt front pockets. Recycled polyester lining.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with a shawl collar, thin shoulder pads, welt front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with a short slit at the cuffs. No fasteners. Lined.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a soft, loose knit with no buttons. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Lined triangle bikini top with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage and ties at the back and back of the neck.
